issue.title: Build SplitSync (Expense Sharing App) - Fixed Workflow
issue.body:
Build SplitSync, a modern expense sharing application similar to Splitwise.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 16.1.4 with App Router
- TypeScript 5.9.3
- Drizzle ORM with SQLite
- Socket.io for real-time updates
- Tailwind CSS + shadcn/ui for UI
- Playwright for E2E testing

## Core Features
1. User authentication and session management
2. Group creation and management (users can create expense-sharing groups)
3. Expense tracking (who paid, split type, amount, date, description, category)
4. Multiple split methods (equal, exact amounts, percentages, shares)
5. Balance calculations (who owes whom)
6. Settlement tracking (partial and full settlements)
7. Real-time updates via WebSocket
8. Expense activity feed

## Requirements
- Complete database schema with all tables
- Authentication with secure password hashing
- RESTful API for all operations
- Responsive UI with modern design
- Real-time updates using Socket.io
- E2E tests with Playwright

The implementation should be production-ready with proper error handling, validation, and edge cases covered.

ems.task: Project Setup - Create project configuration files, tooling configs, CI/CD workflow, environment templates, and infrastructure files (Docker, docker-compose). ABSOLUTELY NO src/ directory - only root-level configs.

workers.task: Create all root-level project configuration files including .gitignore, package.json with all dependencies, tsconfig.json, CI/CD workflow, Dockerfile, docker-compose.yml, .env.example, and README.md for the SplitSync expense sharing application

analysisSummary: Build SplitSync, a modern expense sharing application with Next.js 16, TypeScript, Drizzle ORM, and Socket.io. Implementation includes user authentication, group management, expense tracking with multiple split methods, balance calculations, settlement tracking, real-time WebSocket updates, and comprehensive E2E testing with Playwright.

pendingEMs.task: Data Layer - Design and implement complete database schema using Drizzle ORM with SQLite. Create all tables (users, groups, expenses, splits, settlements, activities), migrations, and data access layer with repositories.

Authentication System - Implement secure authentication with password hashing, session management, login/register forms, auth middleware, and protected route handling. Integrate with Next.js App Router auth patterns.
Group Management API - Build RESTful API endpoints for creating groups, adding/removing members, managing group settings, and group listing. Include validation, error handling, and permissions.

Expense Management API - Implement API endpoints for expense CRUD operations, multiple split types (equal, exact, percentages, shares), expense categories, and expense history. Include balance calculation logic.
Settlement & Activity API - Create API endpoints for recording settlements (partial and full), settlement history, and activity feed. Implement settlement suggestion logic and activity tracking.
Real-time WebSocket Layer - Implement Socket.io server for real-time updates on expenses, settlements, group changes, and user activities. Create event handlers and broadcast logic.
UI Components Library - Build reusable UI components using shadcn/ui and Tailwind CSS. Components include forms, cards, modals, tables, expense displays, balance indicators, and navigation elements.
Dashboard & Group Pages - Create main dashboard view, group list page, group detail page, and group management UI. Integrate with real-time updates and implement responsive design.
Expense & Settlement Pages - Build expense creation/editing forms, expense list views, settlement recording interface, balance visualization, and activity feed. Implement split type selection UIs.
